title: ISic001747. I.Sicily inscription 001747
body:
Facsimile Images

Πετρώνιος Διονύσις
ζῆσας καλῶς ἒτη ( vac. 1) π´
μῆνας ἓξ´ ἡμέρας ιε´
ἐτελεύτησεν πρὸ ζ´ εἰδ(ῶν)
5ἰουλίων καὶ ἐνθάδε κεῖτε

Apparatus criticus

Text of Orsi 1893

English translation

Petronios Dionysis, having lived well for 80 years, six months, 15 days, died 7 days before the Ides of July and lies here

commentary

bibliography

  • Orsi 1893 305 no. 104 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
  • Strazzulla 1897 152 no. 221 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001390
  • Wessel 1989 178 no. 753 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394
